title: The Story of Asya Klyachina, who was in love, but never got married

sources.title: The Story of Asya Klyachina, who was in love, but never got married
sources.description:
A film about love of a village girl, Asya the lame, for the tractor driver Stepan. Asya loves him devotedly and recklessly, decides to give birth to a child from him, despite the fact that Stepan does not even think about marrying her. Chirkunov is in love with Asya, he is ready to do anything for her. However, Asya cannot give up her love for Stepan. The film was filmed in the village of Kadnitsy, Gorky Region, with village residents playing most of the roles.

IMDb rating: 7.3

Year of production: 1966

Director: Mikhalkov-Konchalovsky Andrey
Writer: Klepikov Yuri
Operator: Rerberg Georgy
Production designer: Romadin Mikhail

Cast: Lyubov Sokolova, Iya Savvina, Alexander Surin, Gennady Egorychev, Ivan Petrov, E. Assesorova, L. Zaitseva, Mikhail Kislov, Vladimir Krylov, Nazar Nazarov, Boris Parfenov, S. Parfenov, Kolya Pogodin, Fedor Rodionychev, N. Serova
